get.summary: Retrieves list of jobs based on filter parameters.
get.description: Retrieves list of jobs based on filter parameters.

parameters.name: maxpagesize
parameters.description: Number of objects to return per page.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: If specified, filter jobs by status.

values.name: pendingClassification
values.description: Job is waiting to be classified.

values.name: assigned
values.description: Job has been assigned to a worker.

values.name: completed
values.description: Job has been completed by a worker.

values.name: closed
values.description: Job has been closed by a worker.

values.name: classificationFailed
values.description: Classification process failed for the job.

values.name: pendingSchedule
values.description: Job has been created but not been scheduled yet.

values.name: waitingForActivation
values.description: Job is in a suspended state and waiting for an update.

values.name: active
values.description: Job is in a state of PendingClassification or Queued or Assigned or ClassificationFailed or Completed or PendingSchedule or Scheduled or ScheduleFailed or WaitingForActivation.

parameters.name: queueId
parameters.description: If specified, filter jobs by queue.

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: If specified, filter jobs by channel.

parameters.name: classificationPolicyId
parameters.description: If specified, filter jobs by classificationPolicy.

parameters.name: scheduledBefore
parameters.description: If specified, filter on jobs that was scheduled before or at given timestamp. Range: (-Inf, scheduledBefore].

parameters.name: scheduledAfter
parameters.description: If specified, filter on jobs that was scheduled at or after given value. Range: [scheduledAfter, +Inf).

values.name: active
values.description: Worker is active and available to take offers.

values.name: draining
values.description: Worker is not active, if there are existing offers they are being revoked. No new offers are sent.

values.name: inactive
values.description: Worker is not active. No new offers are sent.

values.name: all
values.description: Worker is active or draining or inactive.

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: If specified, select workers who have a channel configuration with this channel.

parameters.name: queueId
parameters.description: If specified, select workers who are assigned to this queue.

parameters.name: hasCapacity
parameters.description: If set to true, select only workers who have capacity for the channel specified by `channelId` or for any channel if `channelId` not specified. If set to false, then will return all workers including workers without any capacity for jobs. Defaults to false.

workerId.description: Id of the worker that has been assigned this job.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

Azure.Core.Foundations.InnerError.description: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Azure REST API guidelines - https://aka.ms/AzureRestApiGuidelines#handling-errors.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

Azure.Core.eTag.description:
The ETag (or entity tag) HTTP response header is an identifier for a specific version of a resource.
It lets caches be more efficient and save bandwidth, as a web server does not need to resend a full response if the content was not changed.

It is a string of ASCII characters placed between double quotes, like "675af34563dc-tr34".

BestWorkerMode.description: Jobs are distributed to the worker with the strongest abilities available.

scoringRule.description: Define a scoring rule to use, when calculating a score to determine the best worker. If not set, will use a default scoring formula that uses the number of job labels that the worker labels match, as well as the number of label selectors the worker labels match and/or exceed using a logistic function (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Logistic_function).

scoringRuleOptions.description: Options to configure 'scoringRule'. If not set, default values are used.

BestWorkerModeCreateOrUpdate.description: Jobs are distributed to the worker with the strongest abilities available.

scoringRule.description: Define a scoring rule to use, when calculating a score to determine the best worker. If not set, will use a default scoring formula that uses the number of job labels that the worker labels match, as well as the number of label selectors the worker labels match and/or exceed using a logistic function (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Logistic_function).

scoringRuleOptions.description: Options to configure 'scoringRule'. If not set, default values are used.

CancelExceptionAction.description: An action that marks a job as cancelled.

note.description: A note that will be appended to a job's notes collection with the current timestamp.

dispositionCode.description: Indicates the outcome of a job, populate this field with your own custom values.

CancelJobOptions.description: Request payload for cancelling a job.

note.description: A note that will be appended to a job's Notes collection with the current timestamp.

dispositionCode.description: Indicates the outcome of a job, populate this field with your own custom values. If not provided, default value of "Cancelled" is set.

CancelJobResult.description: Response payload from cancelling a job.

etag.description: The entity tag for this resource.

fallbackQueueId.description: Id of a fallback queue to select if queue selector attachments doesn't find a match.

queueSelectorAttachments.description: Queue selector attachments used to resolve a queue for a job.

prioritizationRule.description: A rule to determine a priority score for a job.

workerSelectorAttachments.description: Worker selector attachments used to attach worker selectors to a job.

ClassificationPolicyCreateOrUpdate.description: A container for the rules that govern how jobs are classified.

fallbackQueueId.description: Id of a fallback queue to select if queue selector attachments doesn't find a match.

queueSelectorAttachments.description: Queue selector attachments used to resolve a queue for a job.

prioritizationRule.description: A rule to determine a priority score for a job.

workerSelectorAttachments.description: Worker selector attachments used to attach worker selectors to a job.

dispositionCode.description: Indicates the outcome of a job, populate this field with your own custom values.

closeAt.description: If not provided, worker capacity is released immediately along with a JobClosedEvent notification. If provided, worker capacity is released along with a JobClosedEvent notification at a future time in UTC.

note.description: A note that will be appended to a job's Notes collection with the current timestamp.

CloseJobResult.description: Response payload from closing a job.

note.description: A note that will be appended to a job's Notes collection with the current timestamp.

CompleteJobResult.description: Response payload from completing a job.

ConditionalQueueSelectorAttachment.description: Describes a set of queue selectors that will be attached if the given condition resolves to true.

condition.description: The condition that must be true for the queue selectors to be attached.

ConditionalWorkerSelectorAttachment.description: Describes a set of worker selectors that will be attached if the given condition resolves to true.

condition.description: The condition that must be true for the worker selectors to be attached.

retryOfferAt.description: If the RetryOfferAt is not provided, then this job will not be offered again to the worker who declined this job unless the worker is de-registered and re-registered.  If a RetryOfferAt time is provided, then the job will be re-matched to eligible workers at the retry time in UTC.  The worker that declined the job will also be eligible for the job at that time.

DeclineJobOfferResult.description: Response payload from declining a job.

DirectMapRouterRule.description: A rule that return the same labels as the input labels.

DirectMapRouterRuleCreateOrUpdate.description: A rule that return the same labels as the input labels.

DistributionMode.description: Abstract base class for defining a distribution mode.

minConcurrentOffers.description: Governs the minimum desired number of active concurrent offers a job can have.

maxConcurrentOffers.description: Governs the maximum number of active concurrent offers a job can have.

bypassSelectors.description: If set to true, then router will match workers to jobs even if they don't match label selectors. Warning: You may get workers that are not qualified for a job they are matched with if you set this variable to true. This flag is intended more for temporary usage. By default, set to false.

kind.description: The type discriminator describing a sub-type of DistributionMode.

DistributionModeCreateOrUpdate.description: Abstract base class for defining a distribution mode.

minConcurrentOffers.description: Governs the minimum desired number of active concurrent offers a job can have.

maxConcurrentOffers.description: Governs the maximum number of active concurrent offers a job can have.

bypassSelectors.description: If set to true, then router will match workers to jobs even if they don't match label selectors. Warning: You may get workers that are not qualified for a job they are matched with if you set this variable to true. This flag is intended more for temporary usage. By default, set to false.

credential.description: Credentials used to access Azure function rule.

FunctionRouterRuleCreateOrUpdate.description: A rule providing a binding to an HTTP Triggered Azure Function.

credential.description: Credentials used to access Azure function rule.

FunctionRouterRuleCredential.description: Credentials used to access Azure function rule.

functionKey.description: Access key scoped to a particular function.

appKey.description: Access key scoped to a Azure Function app. This key grants access to all functions under the app.

clientId.description: Client id, when AppKey is provided In context of Azure function, this is usually the name of the key.

JobMatchingMode.description:
A matching mode of one of the following types:
QueueAndMatchMode: Used when matching worker to a job is required to be done right after job is queued.
ScheduleAndSuspendMode: Used for scheduling jobs to be queued at a future time. At specified time, matching of a worker to the job will not start automatically.
SuspendMode: Used when matching workers to a job needs to be suspended.

kind.description: The type discriminator describing a sub-type of JobMatchingMode.

JobMatchingModeCreateOrUpdate.description:
A matching mode of one of the following types:
QueueAndMatchMode: Used when matching worker to a job is required to be done right after job is queued.
ScheduleAndSuspendMode: Used for scheduling jobs to be queued at a future time. At specified time, matching of a worker to the job will not start automatically.
SuspendMode: Used when matching workers to a job needs to be suspended.

kind.description: The type discriminator describing a sub-type of JobMatchingMode.

JobMatchingModeKind.description: Discriminators for supported matching mode types.

LabelOperator.description: Describes supported operations on label values.

LongestIdleMode.description: Jobs are directed to the worker who has been idle longest.

LongestIdleModeCreateOrUpdate.description: Jobs are directed to the worker who has been idle longest.

ManualReclassifyExceptionAction.description: An action that manually reclassifies a job by providing the queue, priority and worker selectors.

OAuth2WebhookClientCredential.description: OAuth2.0 Credentials used to Contoso's Authorization server. Reference: https://www.oauth.com/oauth2-servers/access-tokens/client-credentials/

clientSecret.description: Client secret for Contoso Authorization server.

PassThroughQueueSelectorAttachment.description: Attaches a queue selector where the value is passed through from a job's label with the same key.

key.description: The label key to query against.

labelOperator.description: Describes how the value of the label is compared to the value pass through.

PassThroughWorkerSelectorAttachment.description: Attaches a worker selector where the value is passed through from a job's label with the same key.

key.description: The label key to query against.

labelOperator.description: Describes how the value of the label is compared to the value pass through.

expiresAfterSeconds.description: Describes how long the attached label selector is valid in seconds.

QueueAndMatchMode.description: Describes a matching mode where matching worker to a job is automatically started after job is queued successfully.

QueueAndMatchModeCreateOrUpdate.description: Describes a matching mode where matching worker to a job is automatically started after job is queued successfully.

QueueLengthExceptionTrigger.description: Trigger for an exception action on exceeding queue length.

threshold.description: Threshold of number of jobs ahead in the queue to for this trigger to fire.

QueueSelectorAttachment.description: An attachment of queue selectors to resolve a queue to a job from a classification policy.

kind.description: The type discriminator describing a sub-type of QueueSelectorAttachment.

QueueSelectorAttachmentKind.description: Discriminators for supported queue selector attachment types.

QueueWeightedAllocation.description: Contains the weight percentage and queue selectors to be applied if selected for weighted distributions.

weight.description: The percentage of this weight, expressed as a fraction of 1.

queueSelectors.description: A collection of queue selectors that will be applied if this allocation is selected.

ReclassifyExceptionAction.description: An action that modifies labels on a job and then reclassifies it.

classificationPolicyId.description: The new classification policy that will determine queue, priority and worker selectors.

labelsToUpsert.description: Dictionary containing the labels to update (or add if not existing) in key-value pairs.  Values must be primitive values - number, string, boolean.

ReclassifyJobResult.description: Response payload from reclassifying a job.

RoundRobinMode.description: Jobs are distributed in order to workers, starting with the worker that is after the last worker to receive a job.

RoundRobinModeCreateOrUpdate.description: Jobs are distributed in order to workers, starting with the worker that is after the last worker to receive a job.

RouterChannel.description: Represents the capacity a job in this channel will consume from a worker.

capacityCostPerJob.description: The amount of capacity that an instance of a job of this channel will consume of the total worker capacity.

maxNumberOfJobs.description: The maximum number of jobs that can be supported concurrently for this channel. Value must be greater than zero.

RouterJob.description: A unit of work to be routed

etag.description: The entity tag for this resource.

channelReference.description: Reference to an external parent context, eg. call ID.

enqueuedAt.description: Timestamp a job was queued in UTC.

channelId.description: The channel identifier. eg. voice, chat, etc.

classificationPolicyId.description: Id of a classification policy used for classifying this job.

queueId.description: Id of a queue that this job is queued to.

priority.description: Priority of this job. Value must be between -100 to 100.

dispositionCode.description: Reason code for cancelled or closed jobs.

requestedWorkerSelectors.description: A collection of manually specified worker selectors, which a worker must satisfy in order to process this job.

attachedWorkerSelectors.description: A collection of worker selectors attached by a classification policy, which a worker must satisfy in order to process this job.

labels.description: A set of key/value pairs that are identifying attributes used by the rules engines to make decisions. Values must be primitive values - number, string, boolean.

assignments.description: A collection of the assignments of the job. Key is AssignmentId.

tags.description: A set of non-identifying attributes attached to this job. Values must be primitive values - number, string, boolean.

notes.description: Notes attached to a job, sorted by timestamp.

scheduledAt.description: If set, job will be scheduled to be enqueued at a given time.

matchingMode.description: If provided, will determine how job matching will be carried out. Default mode: QueueAndMatchMode.

RouterJobAssignment.description: Assignment details of a job to a worker.

workerId.description: Id of the Worker assigned to the job.

assignedAt.description: Timestamp when the job was assigned to a worker in UTC.

completedAt.description: Timestamp when the job was marked as completed after being assigned in UTC.

closedAt.description: Timestamp when the job was marked as closed after being completed in UTC.

RouterJobCreateOrUpdate.description: A unit of work to be routed

channelReference.description: Reference to an external parent context, eg. call ID.

channelId.description: The channel identifier. eg. voice, chat, etc.

classificationPolicyId.description: Id of a classification policy used for classifying this job.

queueId.description: Id of a queue that this job is queued to.

priority.description: Priority of this job. Value must be between -100 to 100.

dispositionCode.description: Reason code for cancelled or closed jobs.

requestedWorkerSelectors.description: A collection of manually specified worker selectors, which a worker must satisfy in order to process this job.

labels.description: A set of key/value pairs that are identifying attributes used by the rules engines to make decisions. Values must be primitive values - number, string, boolean.

tags.description: A set of non-identifying attributes attached to this job. Values must be primitive values - number, string, boolean.

notes.description: Notes attached to a job, sorted by timestamp.

matchingMode.description: If provided, will determine how job matching will be carried out. Default mode: QueueAndMatchMode.

RouterJobNote.description: A note attached to a job.

message.description: The message contained in the note.

addedAt.description: The time at which the note was added in UTC. If not provided, will default to the current time.

RouterJobOffer.description: An offer of a job to a worker.

capacityCost.description: The capacity cost consumed by the job offer.

offeredAt.description: Timestamp when the offer was created in UTC.

expiresAt.description: Timestamp when the offer will expire in UTC.

RouterJobPositionDetails.description: Position and estimated wait time for a job.

jobId.description: Id of the job these details are about.

position.description: Position of the job in question within that queue.

queueId.description: Id of the queue this job is enqueued in.

queueLength.description: Length of the queue: total number of enqueued jobs.

estimatedWaitTimeMinutes.description: Estimated wait time of the job rounded up to the nearest minute.

RouterJobStatus.description: Describes the various status of a job.

values.name: pendingClassification
values.description: Job is waiting to be classified.

values.name: assigned
values.description: Job has been assigned to a worker.

values.name: completed
values.description: Job has been completed by a worker.

values.name: closed
values.description: Job has been closed by a worker.

values.name: classificationFailed
values.description: Classification process failed for the job.

values.name: pendingSchedule
values.description: Job has been created but not been scheduled yet.

values.name: waitingForActivation
values.description: Job is in a suspended state and waiting for an update.

RouterQueue.description: A queue that can contain jobs to be routed.

etag.description: The entity tag for this resource.

distributionPolicyId.description: Id of a distribution policy that will determine how a job is distributed to workers.

labels.description: A set of key/value pairs that are identifying attributes used by the rules engines to make decisions. Values must be primitive values - number, string, boolean.

exceptionPolicyId.description: Id of an exception policy that determines various job escalation rules.

RouterQueueCreateOrUpdate.description: A queue that can contain jobs to be routed.

distributionPolicyId.description: Id of a distribution policy that will determine how a job is distributed to workers.

labels.description: A set of key/value pairs that are identifying attributes used by the rules engines to make decisions. Values must be primitive values - number, string, boolean.

exceptionPolicyId.description: Id of an exception policy that determines various job escalation rules.

RouterQueueSelector.description: Describes a condition that must be met against a set of labels for queue selection.

key.description: The label key to query against.

labelOperator.description: Describes how the value of the label is compared to the value defined on the label selector.

value.description: The value to compare against the actual label value with the given operator. Values must be primitive values - number, string, boolean.

queueId.description: Id of the queue these details are about.

length.description: Length of the queue: total number of enqueued jobs.

estimatedWaitTimeMinutes.description: The estimated wait time of this queue rounded up to the nearest minute, grouped by job priority.

longestJobWaitTimeMinutes.description: The wait time of the job that has been enqueued in this queue for the longest.

RouterRule.description:
A rule of one of the following types:
StaticRule:  A rule providing static rules that always return the same result, regardless of input.
DirectMapRule:  A rule that return the same labels as the input labels.
ExpressionRule: A rule providing inline expression rules.
FunctionRule: A rule providing a binding to an HTTP Triggered Azure Function.
WebhookRule: A rule providing a binding to a webserver following OAuth2.0 authentication protocol.

kind.description: The type discriminator describing a sub-type of RouterRule

RouterRuleCreateOrUpdate.description:
A rule of one of the following types:
StaticRule:  A rule providing static rules that always return the same result, regardless of input.
DirectMapRule:  A rule that return the same labels as the input labels.
ExpressionRule: A rule providing inline expression rules.
FunctionRule: A rule providing a binding to an HTTP Triggered Azure Function.
WebhookRule: A rule providing a binding to a webserver following OAuth2.0 authentication protocol.

kind.description: The type discriminator describing a sub-type of RouterRule

RouterRuleKind.description: Discriminators for supported router rule types.

RouterWorker.description: An entity for jobs to be routed to.

etag.description: The entity tag for this resource.

queues.description: Collection of queue(s) that this worker can receive work from.

capacity.description: The total capacity score this worker has to manage multiple concurrent jobs.

labels.description: A set of key/value pairs that are identifying attributes used by the rules engines to make decisions. Values must be primitive values - number, string, boolean.

tags.description: A set of non-identifying attributes attached to this worker. Values must be primitive values - number, string, boolean.

channels.description: Collection of channel(s) this worker can handle and their impact on the workers capacity.

offers.description: A list of active offers issued to this worker.

assignedJobs.description: A list of assigned jobs attached to this worker.

loadRatio.description: A value indicating the workers capacity. A value of '1' means all capacity is consumed. A value of '0' means no capacity is currently consumed.

availableForOffers.description: A flag indicating this worker is open to receive offers or not.

maxConcurrentOffers.description: If this is set, the worker will only receive up to this many new offers at a time.

RouterWorkerAssignment.description: The assignment for a worker to a job.

capacityCost.description: The amount of capacity this assignment has consumed on the worker.

assignedAt.description: The assignment time of the job in UTC.

RouterWorkerCreateOrUpdate.description: An entity for jobs to be routed to.

queues.description: Collection of queue(s) that this worker can receive work from.

capacity.description: The total capacity score this worker has to manage multiple concurrent jobs.

labels.description: A set of key/value pairs that are identifying attributes used by the rules engines to make decisions. Values must be primitive values - number, string, boolean.

tags.description: A set of non-identifying attributes attached to this worker. Values must be primitive values - number, string, boolean.

channels.description: Collection of channel(s) this worker can handle and their impact on the workers capacity.

availableForOffers.description: A flag indicating this worker is open to receive offers or not.

maxConcurrentOffers.description: If this is set, the worker will only receive up to this many new offers at a time.

RouterWorkerSelector.description: Describes a condition that must be met against a set of labels for worker selection.

key.description: The label key to query against.

labelOperator.description: Describes how the value of the label is compared to the value defined on the worker selector.

value.description: The value to compare against the actual label value with the given operator. Values must be primitive values - number, string, boolean.

expiresAfterSeconds.description: Describes how long this label selector is valid in seconds.

expedite.description: Pushes a job to the front of the queue as long as this selector is active.

expiresAt.description: The time at which this worker selector expires in UTC.

RouterWorkerSelectorStatus.description: Describes the status of a worker selector.

values.name: active
values.description: Worker is active and available to take offers.

values.name: draining
values.description: Worker is not active, if there are existing offers they are being revoked. No new offers are sent.

values.name: inactive
values.description: Worker is not active. No new offers are sent.

RuleEngineQueueSelectorAttachment.description: Attaches queue selectors to a job when the RouterRule is resolved.

rule.description: A RouterRule that resolves a collection of queue selectors to attach.

RuleEngineWorkerSelectorAttachment.description: Attaches worker selectors to a job when a RouterRule is resolved.

rule.description: A RouterRule that resolves a collection of worker selectors to attach.

ScheduleAndSuspendMode.description: Describes a matching mode used for scheduling jobs to be queued at a future time. At the specified time, matching worker to a job will not start automatically.

ScheduleAndSuspendModeCreateOrUpdate.description: Describes a matching mode used for scheduling jobs to be queued at a future time. At the specified time, matching worker to a job will not start automatically.

ScoringRuleOptions.description: Encapsulates all options that can be passed as parameters for scoring rule with BestWorkerMode.

batchSize.description: Set batch size when 'isBatchScoringEnabled' is set to true. Defaults to 20 if not configured.

scoringParameters.description: List of extra parameters from a job that will be sent as part of the payload to scoring rule. If not set, a job's labels (sent in the payload as `job`) and a job's worker selectors (sent in the payload as `selectors`) are added to the payload of the scoring rule by default. Note: Worker labels are always sent with scoring payload.

isBatchScoringEnabled.description: If set to true, will score workers in batches, and the parameter name of the worker labels will be sent as `workers`. By default, set to false and the parameter name for the worker labels will be sent as `worker`. Note: If enabled, use 'batchSize' to set batch size.

descendingOrder.description: If false, will sort scores by ascending order. By default, set to true.

ScoringRuleParameterSelector.description: Supported parameters for scoring workers used with BestWorkerMode.

values.name: jobLabels
values.description: Parameter to add job labels to scoring payload.  Property is sent as `job`.

values.name: workerSelectors
values.description: Parameter to add worker selectors from a job to scoring payload.  Property is sent as `selectors`.

StaticQueueSelectorAttachment.description: Describes a queue selector that will be attached to a job.

StaticRouterRule.description: A rule providing static rules that always return the same result, regardless of input.

value.description: The static value this rule always returns. Values must be primitive values - number, string, boolean.

StaticRouterRuleCreateOrUpdate.description: A rule providing static rules that always return the same result, regardless of input.

value.description: The static value this rule always returns. Values must be primitive values - number, string, boolean.

StaticWorkerSelectorAttachment.description: Describes a worker selector that will be attached to a job.

SuspendMode.description: Describes a matching mode where matching worker to a job is suspended.

SuspendModeCreateOrUpdate.description: Describes a matching mode where matching worker to a job is suspended.

UnassignJobOptions.description: Request payload for unassigning a job.

suspendMatching.description: If SuspendMatching is true, then a job is not queued for re-matching with a worker.

UnassignJobResult.description: Response payload after a job has been successfully unassigned.

unassignmentCount.description: The number of times a job is unassigned. At a maximum 3.

WaitTimeExceptionTrigger.description: Trigger for an exception action on exceeding wait time.

thresholdSeconds.description: Threshold for wait time for this trigger.

WebhookRouterRule.description: A rule providing a binding to an external web server.

clientCredential.description: OAuth2.0 Credentials used to Contoso's Authorization server. Reference: https://www.oauth.com/oauth2-servers/access-tokens/client-credentials/

WebhookRouterRuleCreateOrUpdate.description: A rule providing a binding to an external web server.

clientCredential.description: OAuth2.0 Credentials used to Contoso's Authorization server. Reference: https://www.oauth.com/oauth2-servers/access-tokens/client-credentials/

WeightedAllocationQueueSelectorAttachmen.description: Describes multiple sets of queue selectors, of which one will be selected and attached according to a weighting.

allocations.description: A collection of percentage based weighted allocations.

WeightedAllocationWorkerSelectorAttachme.description: Describes multiple sets of worker selectors, of which one will be selected and attached according to a weighting.

allocations.description: A collection of percentage based weighted allocations.

WorkerSelectorAttachment.description: An attachment which attaches worker selectors to a job.

kind.description: The type discriminator describing a sub-type of WorkerSelectorAttachment.

WorkerSelectorAttachmentKind.description: Discriminators for supported worker selector attachment types.

WorkerWeightedAllocation.description: Contains the weight percentage and worker selectors to be applied if selected for weighted distributions.

weight.description: The percentage of this weight, expressed as a fraction of 1.

workerSelectors.description: A collection of worker selectors that will be applied if this allocation is selected.

Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.name: api-version
Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.description: The API version to use for this operation.

RouterConditionalRequestHeaders.ifMatch.name: If-Match
RouterConditionalRequestHeaders.ifMatch.description: The request should only proceed if an entity matches this string.

RouterConditionalRequestHeaders.ifUnmodi.name: If-Unmodified-Since
RouterConditionalRequestHeaders.ifUnmodi.description: The request should only proceed if the entity was not modified after this time.
